transform_def.name: target_practice
transform_def.string: let n = complex(cos(toReal(truncateToInt(p_in.x))), sin(toReal(truncateToInt(p_in.y)))) r = length(vec2(n.im + n.re)) * twoinvpi() x = truncateToInt(r) y1 = log(complex(tanh(toReal(x)), sinh(toReal(x)))) y2 = log(complex(cosh(toReal(x)), tanh(toReal(x)))) in (p_in * vec2(y1.im + y2.re).y * floor(r)) * (0.1 / weight)
